backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining encouragement messages, user profiles, badges, and daily message logic with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking deployment-related files and components to a production publish feature.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide for deploying the app’s backend canister and frontend assets to production on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS base styles and OKLCH color variables for both light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in settings, auth, profile setup, and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that prompts users to sign in via Internet Identity before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter their name and creates an initial profile on save.
frontend/src/components/branding/Generat: Exports paths and alt text for generated mascot, badges, and background assets.
frontend/src/components/feedback/GentleS: Reusable loading, empty, and error UI components with gentle visuals and optional retry actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout applying text‑size and reduced‑motion settings with a fixed background pattern.
frontend/src/constants/routineCategories: Defines the four routine categories with names, descriptions, and themed Tailwind color classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, messages, favorites, stats, and badges via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewardFlow.ts: Triggers a celebration flow and optional sound when the user hits message‑viewing milestones.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind styles with theming variables, text sizing classes, motion‑reduction support, and base UI adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BadgeCelebrationScree: Displays an animated badge‑earned celebration with optional sound and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/pages/BadgesScreen.tsx: Shows user progress, earned badges, and handles loading/error states for stats and badge data.
frontend/src/pages/EncouragementScreen.t: Displays random encouragement messages with navigation, favorites, TTS, and sound effects, using multiple query hooks and user settings.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesScreen.tsx: Shows the user's saved favorite messages with options to remove items and navigate home.
frontend/src/pages/HomeScreen.tsx: Provides the main landing page with navigation to encouragement, routine mode, favorites, settings, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/RoutineModeScreen.tsx: Lets users pick a routine category and cycle through related messages while updating stats and playing sounds.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsScreen.tsx: Allows users to configure text size, reduced motion, sounds, and TTS settings.
frontend/src/state/SettingsContext.tsx: Manages global app settings with localStorage persistence and exposes setters via React context.
frontend/src/utils/sound.ts: Implements simple click and success sound effects using the Web Audio API.
frontend/src/utils/tts.ts: Provides text‑to‑speech helpers with feature detection and speech control.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing) and storing, retrieving, or clearing them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, features, and architectural notes for the motivation-focused children’s app.
